entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pincourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of light snow or drizzle this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
